title: 8 "A War of Hide and Seek"Transliteration: "Kakurenbo Sensō" (Japanese:かくれんぼ戦争) Yūsuke Kawakami Dai Hazeyama Yūsuke Kawakami August 24, 2024(2024-08-24)
transformers_text: 8 A War of Hide and Seek Transliteration Kaku r enbo Sens Japanese Y suke Kawakami Dai Haze yama Y suke Kawakami August 24 2024 2024 08 24 After finishing their preparations for the impending invasion Toki yuki asks Fub uki to teach him some swordsman ship In the occasion Fub uki decides to teach Toki yuki a special fighting style that is appropriate for his elusive abilities and kind nature but only works in one on one fights so that Toki yuki can defeat the enemy general himself Sh kan invades the village and most of his men fall by the traps set by the villagers and the Elusive Warriors Koji r and Aya ko lead Sh kan to a small house where he is locked inside with Toki yuki who challenges him to a duel Toki yuki questions his motives on attacking the village despite having already killed its adults and Sh kan replies taking joy with making the village's children suffer Enraged Toki yuki begins the duel as the other Elusive Warriors handle Sh kan's lieutenants Sh kan certain that he has the advantage attacks Toki yuki who evades all his attacks and manages to seriously injure him which surprises Sh kan
